titleInfo.title: Harvard civil rights-civil liberties law review.

originInfo.publisher: [Cambridge, Mass., Harvard Civil Rights-Civil Liberties Law Review, etc.] 1980.

mods.note: Vols. for 1966-68 issued by the Harvard Civil Rights Committee and the Harvard Civil Liberties Research Service in conjunction with the Law Students Civil Rights Research Council; 1969- by Harvard Civil Rights-Civil Liberties Research Committee./ Supplement: Harvard civil rights-civil liberties amicus/ 2153-2389RAC Library online has one issuse of this serial
